Articles.Content: Just started playing. After a crash, how do you get back to the Space Center or the VAB?

Welcome to the forums!

I assume you're talking about a rocket/plane crash and not a game crash.

You should be able to go back to the space center by pressing "Esc" and then "Space Center" in the popup window.

You could also press Esc and "Revert" back to the pad or VAB. It's like the crash never happened.

Also, these sort of questions go in the "Gameplay Questions" forum.

Welcome to the wonderful worlds of KSP and its forums.

Theres also an option in the alt-F12 menu or shift F12 if on linux to enable being able to revert to the initial launch always not just within KSC proximity in gameplay

 

Also KSP makes a great stratofortress
